Doggo & Catto Drinks

Holly, jolly all the way

All the drinks are here and bringing the festivity all holiday season.

Hot Coffee

D&C Signature

Hand-Made Cappuccino, Composed of espresso and hot milk. Topping with foamed milk in the shape of a cat.

Caramel Machiatop

Steaming creamy whole milk and delicate, meringue-like foam and a rich caramel topping.

Latte

Small amount of steamed milk and foam. This caf√© is for those who love a rich, bold taste.

Cappuchino

Perfect balance of light and airy foam and deeply delicious espresso. Made with 100% Columbian Coffee Beans.

Iced Coffee

Coffee Bubble Tea

Made with chewy bubbly tapioca pearls and milk. 10 flavors to choose from. #1 Favourite drink.

Iced Peppermint White Chocolate Mocha

Made with our signature base and cream, this drink will keep you cool.

Ice Coffee Mocha

A delicious combination of real creamy layers of chocolaty goodness. Perfect summer treat!

Iced Cinnamon Dolce Latte

Our premium blend chill served over ice. Customize with your choice of dairy and sweetness.

Tea

Tea

A bright blend of black teas and fragrant bergamot oil and lavender.

Teavana Earl Grey Brewed Tea

A full-bodied black tea infusion with malty and oaky undertones. Each sip unfolds to reveal an elegant, time.

Teavana Royal English Breakfast Brewed Tea

Spearmint and peppermint join with subtle lemon verbena. This creates cooling, refreshing flavour.

Teavana Mint Majesty Brewed Tea

A full-bodied black tea infusion with malty and oaky undertones. Each sip unfolds to reveal an elegant, time.
